author: cnbc.com
title: Athene Holding Ltd. to Announce First Financial Results on May 3
text:
PEMBROKE, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Athene Holding Ltd. (NYSE: ATH), a leading provider of retirement savings products, today announced it will release financial results for the first quarter 2018 after the market close on Thursday, May 3, 2018. The news release and first quarter Financial Supplement will be available on the ir.athene.com website.
A conference call and live webcast will be held on Friday, May 4, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. ET to discuss the financial results. Additionally, the company will post an earnings presentation deck on the ir.athene.com website prior to market open on May 4, 2018.
Conference Call Details
Live conference call: Toll-free at 1-888-317-6003 (domestic) or 1-412-317-6061 (international) Participant Entry Number: 2689674 Conference call replay available through May 18, 2018 at 1-877-344-7529 (domestic) or 1-412-317-0088 (international) Replay access code: 10118764 Live and archived webcast available at ir.athene.com
About Athene Holding Ltd.
Athene, through its subsidiaries, is a leading retirement services company that issues, reinsures and acquires retirement savings products designed for the increasing number of individuals and institutions seeking to fund retirement needs. The products offered by Athene include:
Retail fixed and fixed indexed annuity products; Reinsurance arrangements with third-party annuity providers; and Institutional products, such as funding agreements and group annuity contracts related to pension risk transfers.
Athene had total assets of approximately $100 billion as of December 31, 2017. Athene's principal subsidiaries include Athene Annuity & Life Assurance Company, a Delaware-domiciled insurance company, Athene Annuity and Life Company, an Iowa-domiciled insurance company, Athene Annuity & Life Assurance Company of New York, a New York-domiciled insurance company and Athene Life Re Ltd., a Bermuda-domiciled reinsurer.
Further information about our companies can be found at www.athene.com .
